column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Had an amazing 3 year anniversary dinner here a couple of weeks ago. Made a reservation in advance- you will definitely need one! Interior is dark
column2: cozy and very 1920s themed. Our server was phenomenal. Very attentive
column4: we had the king crab platter (worth the $$)
column5: and the mixed greens and apple salad. We then split the bone in ribeye
column7: and the Brussels sprouts. Everything was so good! Ribeye was cool perfectly. Lots of flavor! For dessert we did the chocolate cream pie. Definitely a must!! It was more like a ganache- very rich!!
